response.message: Congrats!
Thank you for your fine moderation touch on SO. I wish you all the best in your new role and I'm sure you'll make the difference there as well.
Congratulations!
Congrats, and remind them that "It's a _dry_ heat".

So, to what strange and exciting territories do you plan to start to expand Stack Overflow this time?
Hell, of course. I mean, Phoenix. --Ed.
Grats, bluefeet!

While I was considerably let down by your lack of blue feet in the above picture, I was really happy to see you making community manager :)

Best of luck on your new journey.
I'm *so* glad that SE has such a good philosophy on hiring. And another great result it has produced - welcome, bluefeet!
Congrats!
Congratulations! Happy to know that you are now part of the SE team :)
Congrats! Quite long time passed since the @blue's own blog post :)

Oh, wow! You've always been one of my favourite mods. I'm sure you'll bring the same deft touch to your CR work. :)

Congrats
-LRiO

[Hah, edit *that* signature out! ;)]
That's awesome! Glad you are continuing with the SE team! This should be a great opportunity for you and for the entire community :D Enjoy your new endeavor!
Congrats bluefeet!  Your patient and pragmatic mod skills (and your ability to not be hyper-serious about it all) are a great asset to SE/SO.  Keep up the good work in your CM role.

"her first web development book"

What book was that?
Congrats bluefeet. I appreciate you work on SO.
Congrates bluefeet!!! You done very good job in SE.
Congrates blue feet !!! You're really awesome. You're one of my favorite mod ever :)
Congrats @bluefeet! Enjoy the new job!
Congratulations @bluefeet!
Congrats @bluefeet :-D
Congrats Taryn!  Best of luck!
After looking at bluefeet's answers, I see what you did there.

And finally I realize that you're not actually Aran Deltac (aka bluefeet).
There are actually three bluefeet on Stack Overflow. One of whom is the one you're thinking of. --Ed.
Congrats bluefeet
Congrats, bluefeet!  With the note about the dogs, I suspect you're the one of the three bluefeet I've encountered on Pets.SE
I need to learn a lot  But self learning is very slow process compared to learning one on one. Help me
The literally could not have picked a better person for this job
